item.title: Research
item.description:
Research and Publications

My research focuses on advancing the fields of Federated Learning, Privacy-Preserving Computing, and Machine Learning Systems. Below is a curated list of my key publications and research contributions.

Selected Publications

  1. “Vaccination Against Backdoor Attacks on Federated Learning Systems”
    Details: Explores novel strategies for mitigating backdoor vulnerabilities in federated learning.
    Link

  2. “Measuring Behavioral Similarity in Privacy-Preserving Federated Learning Models”
    Details: Introduces methods for evaluating device behavior while preserving user privacy.
    Link

item.title: About Me
item.description:
About Me

Hello! I’m Agnideven Sundar, a passionate researcher and technology enthusiast with a Ph.D. in Computer Science. My interests lie at the intersection of Artificial Intelligence, Distributed Systems, and Federated Learning. I have a strong background in applying innovative computational techniques to solve complex real-world problems.

Currently, I am leveraging my skills to drive impactful research and contribute to advancements in technology.

Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or explore my Google Scholar profile.
